sources.title: Hurricane Smith
sources.description: Title: Hurricane Smith Summary: Rodeo rider Hurricane Smith is wrongly convicted of murder and robbery, but escapes and creates a new and happy life for himself. But one of the real criminals shows up to claim the loot ... Directed by: Bernard Vorhaus Actors: Ray Middleton, Jane Wyatt, Harry Davenport Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 20 July 1941 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Rodeo rider Hurricane Smith is wrongly convicted of murder and robbery, but escapes and creates a new and happy life for himself. But one of the real criminals shows up to claim the loot which he believes Smith has.

metadata.Plot: Rodeo rider Hurricane Smith is wrongly convicted of murder and robbery, but escapes and creates a new and happy life for himself. But one of the real criminals shows up to claim the loot which he believes Smith has.
metadata.Writer: Charles G. Booth, Robert Presnell Sr.
metadata.Actors: Ray Middleton, Jane Wyatt, Harry Davenport
